data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Ryazan' a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ryazan‘, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 507,755 who are far from you in Ryazan‘, Russia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Ryazan' to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 17,522 believers in Ryazan' to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,179,778 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Aghul people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Ryazan‘, Russia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Ryazan'
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ryazan‘, Russia has a population of 1,197,300.

We estimate Ryazan' has 17,522 people who might know Jesus, 672,023 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 507,755 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Ryazan' who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
